p: The data were presented as mean ± standard deviation. MINITAB 17 statistical packages were used to analyze the data. One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) was done to determine the variations in the antioxidant and antibacterial activity of the different T. trifidum extracts. The means were separated by the Fisher's Least Significant Difference (LSD). Significance was set at P < 0.05.
